name: Lizhao You
content: Welcome to Lizhao's homepage Lizhao You (游理钊) Assistant Professor, PhD Advisor (助理教授, 博导) Department of Information and Communication Engineering School of Informatics, Xiamen University Email: lizhaoyou [AT] xmu.edu.cn Mail Address: Room 103, Building 6, Western District, Xiamen University (Xiangan Campus), No. 4221 Xiangan South Road, Xiamen 361102, China. (通信地址: 厦门市翔安区翔安南路4221号厦门大学翔安校区西部片区6号楼103室，361102) Misc: [GitHub] [GoogleScholar] [ORCID] [DBLP] To Prospective Students 招收研究生和对科研感兴趣的本科生，通常我每年会招收2名硕士研究生。欢迎对网络、安全、边缘智能感兴趣的同学联系我，欢迎有志于提升动手能力的同学联系我。如果能力合适，在学期间，我会帮忙推荐海外高校RA或者大厂实习。 News [2025-07-31] 最新的工作ZCMod/Hetu被TMC/ICNP25录用，ZCMod是水下物联网方向新的波形设计，Hetu是网络验证方向目前为止最快的数据面并行验证方法。 [2024-11-01] 获得国家电网总部项目“新形势下电力监控系统网络安全防护关键技术研究与装备研发”的支持，关注基于人工智能的网络流量分析技术。 [2023-12-28] 2023年下半年有一些工作陆续被录用 (无线方向TMCx1/ToNx1/MSNx1/ISPAx1/WCNCx1, 网络方向APNOMSx1/APNETx1/INFOCOMx1)。 [2021-01-11] I joined XMU. [2020-10-07] My new homepage is online. About Me I am an Assistant Professor with School of Informatics, Xiamen University, China, starting from Jan. 2021. Before that, I was a research engineer at Huawei 2012 Labs (from Nov. 2016 to Dec. 2020). I received my PhD degree in Information Engineering at The Chinsese University of Hong Kong in 2016, supervised by Prof. Soung Chang Liew. Previously, I received my BSc and ME degrees in Computer Science both from Nanjing University, supervised by Prof. Guihai Chen. My research interests span wireless, networking, security, and edge AI. I am particularly motivated by challenging problems in real-world systems, with a focus on developing practical solutions. I work closely with the team led by Prof. Liqun Fu and the team led by Prof. Qiao Xiang.
